package.name: ThanosDance
package.shortDescription: A simple yet elegant way of seeing thanos and spideyboy.

descriptionlist.description: This tweak was created by Brian Valente and all rights are reserved.
A simple yet elegant way of seeing thanos and spideyboy. ThanosDance is a free tweak for iOS.
This tweak only supports iOS 11.2 and above. Also, please report any issues to the above our website https://framedevs.github.io/!
